citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 to 2:30
pm on 15-SEP-16.
Knock door, blow horn, call director and leave message..
